original_title: A Gonzo Story: Bad School Girls
overview: LUX, pretty and usually put together, is now bent over a hotel bed with her skirt hiked up just under her tits as TRIP, sweaty and wild eyed, pounds her from behind while her school girl friends heckle her. This is ok with Lux because she would do anything for Trip in hope of being his girlfriend. When she realizes things didn't work out like she dreamed, Lux sets out to make things right with the same bat that was rammed up her ass the night before. B. Skow seamlessly combines an intriguing story with passionate sex, creampies, facials, and beautiful young school girls in this all new edition of his award winning series "A Gonzo Story."
title: A Gonzo Story: Bad School Girls
